songs.full_title: I Love You So by ​The Walters
songs.title: I Love You So

description.plain: “I Love You So” is about falling in love with someone who isn’t ready for a serious relationship. The love interest in the song isn’t ready to be exclusive and eventually the narrative voice realizes he needs to get over her and move on even though he loves her very much.

body.plain: “I Love You So” is about falling in love with someone who isn’t ready for a serious relationship. The love interest in the song isn’t ready to be exclusive and eventually the narrative voice realizes he needs to get over her and move on even though he loves her very much.

translation_songs.title: The Walters - I Love You So (Русский перевод)

writer_artists.name: Charles Ekhaus, Daniel Wells, Michael James Tirabassi, Walter Kosner

songs.lyrics:
60 ContributorsTranslationsРусскийI Love You So Lyrics[Verse 1]
I just need someone in my life to give it structure
To handle all the selfish ways I'd spend my time without her
You're everything I want, but I can't deal with all your lovers
You're saying I'm the one, but it's your actions that speak louder
Giving me love when you are down and need another
I've got to get away and let you go, I've got to get over

[Chorus]
But I love you so
I love you so
I love you so
I love you so
[Verse 2]
I'm gonna pack my things and leave you behind
This feeling's old and I know that I've made up my mind
I hope you feel what I felt when you shattered my soul
'Cause you were cruel and I'm a fool
So please let me go

[Chorus]
But I love you so (Please let me go)
I love you so (Please let me go)
I love you so (Please let me go)
I love you soYou might also like48Embed

songs.title: Fancy Shoes

description.plain: “Fancy Shoes” is the third song in The Walters EP “Songs for Dads”. A step into the shoes of a heart-ached lover who can’t get his mind off that special someone.

songs.embed_content: Read “Fancy Shoes” by ​The Walters on Genius

body.plain: “Fancy Shoes” is the third song in The Walters EP “Songs for Dads”. A step into the shoes of a heart-ached lover who can’t get his mind off that special someone.

songs.full_title: Fancy Shoes/Night Changes by Hosanna Myrran
songs.title: Fancy Shoes/Night Changes

songs.lyrics:
9 ContributorsFancy Shoes LyricsThere's whiskey inside my veins
I'm feeling heavy and I can't explain
How I feel for you
You got me dizzy and feeling blue

Let's go walking in the city tonight
You'll wear that dress that makes you look so nice
Like my fancy shoes?
I wore them just for you

Tell me why all the good ones go
Well I don't know
But I want it to somehow change
I'll be a better man if you just stay
But I'm a prisoner inside these walls
My bed is colder and I'm feeling small
If you're not sleeping with me
Then I'll get no sleep at all

Tell me why all the good ones go
Well I don't know
But I want it to somehow change
I'll be a better man if you just stayYou might also like5Embed

songs.title: New Girl (Tom’s Song)

description.plain: This song is about tom stuhmcke’s  love for his daughter but also his strife.

songs.embed_content: Read “New Girl (Tom's Song)” by ​The Walters on Genius

body.plain: This song is about tom stuhmcke’s  love for his daughter but also his strife.

songs.lyrics:
15 ContributorsNew Girl (Tom’s Song) Lyrics[Verse 1]
So much has been going on
I promised you I wouldn't run but
My voice won't be heard and it's too hard to end it
It's absurd

[Chorus]
So we're still together for now
But my new girl is coming to town
We're still together for now
But my new girl is coming to town
You dig me there
But you're still scared and I'm scared too
You know it's true
So we're still together for now
But my new girl is coming to town
[Verse 2]
So I imagine you're upset
But I am not responsible for that
I tried to give you happiness
But all that ever happened is you ended getting pissed

[Chorus]
So we're still together for now
But my new girl is coming to town
We're still together for now
But my new girl is coming to town
You dig me there
But you're still scared and I'm scared too
You know it's true
So we're still together for now
But my new girl is coming to town

[Outro]
If that's the way it's gonna go
Then that's the way it's gonna go
If that's the way it's gonna go
Then that's the way it's gonna go
If that's the way it's gonna go
Then that's the way it's gonna go
If that's the way it's gonna go
Then that's the way it's gonna goYou might also likeEmbed
